hero.heading: Welcome
hero.description: My minimalist, stormy oceanic-themed outlet for personal and professional creativity, innovation, accomplishments and thoughts...

myStory.title: My Story
myStory.content:
Hello! I'm a technologist driven by a passion for transforming ideas into elegant, functional solutions. My portfolio showcases a range of projects that reflect my commitment to innovation and problem-solving. I thrive on the challenge of turning complex concepts into clean, efficient code, and I'm particularly excited about the ever-evolving landscape of cybersecurity. My passion for healthcare innovation is deeply personal. As a cancer survivor and COVID-19 long-hauler, and with parents who were both clinicians, I've experienced firsthand the importance of compassionate and effective care. This lifelong immersion in the world of caregivers and support staff fuels my desire to contribute to technological solutions that improve lives.

When I'm not immersed in lines of code (Python, JavaScript, and Ruby), you might find me chasing the thrill of a good thunderstorm, serving up more than just webpages on the tennis court, enjoying the sun-drenched serenity of a sandy beach, or the quiet wonder of the underwater world. I also enjoy the rush of whitewater rafting and the tranquility of horseback riding. And while the idea of Halloween is endlessly fascinating, I prefer to admire the spooky creativity from a safe distance. Travel is another passion of mine, and I'm always eager to explore new places and perspectives, especially when it involves trying new cuisines. Speaking of which, I'm a true foodie at heart, always eager to explore flavors from around the world (though I admit, some spicy dishes test my limits!).

This website serves as a window into my technological journey, a portfolio of my projects, and an online version of my resume. It may also grow and evolve over time to include more facets of who I am, not just professionally but as a human being in general. If you're looking for a dedicated and enthusiastic technologist with a diverse range of interests to join your team, I'd love to connect! You can view my resume here, check out my LinkedIn profile, or explore my projects in the project section or via GitHub.

resume.title: Resume
resume.content: View my experience and skills. I have worked as an implementation manager, web developer, and cybersecurity enthusiast.

favorites.title: Favorites
favorites.content: Check out my favorite things! I enjoy coding, exploring new technologies, and spending time by the ocean.
